trans-unit.source: Call custom API from iOS app
trans-unit.target: Call custom API from iOS app

trans-unit.source: To call this custom API from an iOS client, use the `MSClient invokeAPI` method.
trans-unit.target: To call this custom API from an iOS client, use the `MSClient invokeAPI` method.

trans-unit.source: There are two versions of this method, one for JSON-formatted requests, and one for any data type:
trans-unit.target: There are two versions of this method, one for JSON-formatted requests, and one for any data type:

trans-unit.source: For example, to send a JSON request to a custom API named "sendEmail", pass an `NSDictionary` for the request parameters:
trans-unit.target: For example, to send a JSON request to a custom API named "sendEmail", pass an `NSDictionary` for the request parameters:
